name: Cookie Jump Escape
description:
**** BEST CATCHING GAME EVER!!! AND LOT OF FUN!!! ****

Cookie want to escape and free itself from Evil and Jail. Let help him catch many candies as you can.

Test your acceleration and mental skills. Move your device left and right to make Cookie JUMP ESCAPE! and Catch delicious candies as MANY as you can.

You can share your scores on Game services/Leader Boards to show to all friends on how good you are!!!
